item.title: [Public Cloud][Managed Private Registry] - Chartmuseum removal
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 4, 09:00 - 17:00 UTC

Nov 7, 13:34 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/12/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 04/12/2024 17:00 UTC
Service impact : Chartmuseum will be definitely removed in prevision of upgrade to Harbor version 2.8. If you are still using Chartmuseum to manage Helm Charts, please migrate before the 4th december by following this tutorial: https://help.ovhcloud.com/csm/en-public-cloud-private-registry-migrate-helm-charts?id=kb_article_view&sysparm_article=KB0058869
Helm Charts stored in Chartmuseum not migrated before this date will not be available anymore.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [GRA11][Containers & Orchestration] - Load Balancer incident notification
item.description:
Nov 5, 19:51 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 05/11/2024 16:52 UTC
End time : 05/11/2024 19:35 UTC
Service impact : Customers were facing instability/service loss for the Load Balancer
Root cause : An overload on our platform caused the incident
We would like to inform you that the incident have been resolved and the situation is back to normal.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

Nov 5, 19:04 UTC
Investigating - An incident is in progress on our Load Balancer offer.

Please be aware that this is currently affecting availability.

Here is detail for this incident :

Ongoing actions : Investigating

Our teams are fully mobilized and we will keep you informed of developments and the resolution of the incident.

We apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [Global][Database] - Cloud Databases services MongoDB
item.description:
Oct 30, 14:06 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 28/10/2024 09:00 UTC
End time : 28/10/2024 11:00 UTC
Service Impact : Backups completed earlier than 28/10/2024 11h00 UTC were erroneously deleted. Restore operations based on those backups failed. We are in the process of marking those backups as status ERROR
Root cause : Software issue

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

item.title: [Containers & Orchestration] - Managed Rancher Service maintenance notification
item.description:
Oct 24, 16:59 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Oct 24, 08:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 17, 21:22 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Public Cloud offer.

Start time : 24/10/2024 08:00 UTC
End time : 24/10/2024 16:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Managed Rancher Service, we will be doing a version upgrade to Ranchers. Ranchers in version 2.7.6 and 2.7.9 will be upgraded to 2.7.15 and Ranchers in version 2.8.2 and 2.8.5 will be upgraded to 2.8.7.
